ComicInfo.Title: Five
ComicInfo.Summary: By Francisco Solano Lopez, Ricardo Barreiro, and Pol. It's "Young Witches meets Mandingo" as the setting for this globe-spanning series moves to the antebellum American South. Madeline, the latest witch in the Young Witches genealogy from the previous issue, gets together with one of the slaves. The result of the union is Mamba, who develops into a great apprentice of the African magic traditions (voodoo and macumba). Mamba falls in love with the owner of the plantation, Colonel Raleigh, and soon gives birth to Elizabeth. The link to next issue's rip-roaring conclusion to this epic-length take of sex and magic.
